metadata.description: Office document manipulation plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: slide-studio
plugins.description: Create and modify PowerPoint presentations (PPTX) through direct XML manipulation. Supports all 11 standard Office slide layouts.

plugins.name: oxen-office
plugins.description: Inspect, build, and verify Office documents (PPTX, DOCX, XLSX) using the oxen CLI. Supports ASCII preview, JSON spec-based building, and text extraction.
